title: Bonus 6: Priest-King Melchizedek, International Man of Mystery
itunes:title: Bonus: Priest-King Melchizedek, International Man of Mystery
description: In this co-released episode, Steve Guerra of the History of the Papacy podcast and I discuss the mysterious figure of Melchizedek, and try to work out how he figures in the Jewish and Christian priesthoods. Check out Steve at the Agora Podcast Network.
content:encoded: In this co-released episode, Steve Guerra of the History of the Papacy podcast and I discuss the mysterious figure of Melchizedek, and try to work out how he figures in the Jewish and Christian priesthoods. Check out Steve at the Agora Podcast Network.
itunes:subtitle: Melchizedek and the Jewish and Christian priesthoods.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens, Stephen Guerra
